Package mcp.mobius.waila.api

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    IWailaBlockDecorator
    Callback class interface used to provide Block/TileEntity decorator.
    All methods in this interface shouldn't to be called by the implementing mod.
    IWailaConfigHandler
    Read-only interface for Waila internal config storage.
    An instance of this interface is passed to most of Waila callbacks as a way to change the behavior depending on client settings.
    IWailaDataAccessor
    The Accessor is used to get some basic data out of the game without having to request direct access to the game engine.
    It will also return things that are unmodified by the overriding systems (like getWailaStack).
    An instance of this interface is passed to most of Waila Block/TileEntity callbacks.
    IWailaDataProvider
    Callback class interface used to provide Block/TileEntity tooltip informations to Waila.
    All methods in this interface shouldn't to be called by the implementing mod.
    IWailaEntityAccessor
    The Accessor is used to get some basic data out of the game without having to request direct access to the game engine.
    It will also return things that are unmodified by the overriding systems (like getWailaStack).
    An instance of this interface is passed to most of Waila Entity callbacks.
    IWailaEntityProvider
    Callback class interface used to provide Entity tooltip informations to Waila.
    All methods in this interface shouldn't to be called by the implementing mod.
    IWailaFMPAccessor
    The Accessor is used to get some basic data out of the game without having to request direct access to the game engine.
    It will also return things that are unmodified by the overriding systems (like getWailaStack).
    An instance of this interface is passed to most of Waila FMP callbacks.
    IWailaFMPDecorator
    Callback class interface used to provide FMP decorator.
    All methods in this interface shouldn't to be called by the implementing mod.
    IWailaFMPProvider
    Callback class interface used to provide FMP tooltip informations to Waila.
    All methods in this interface shouldn't to be called by the implementing mod.
    IWailaRegistrar
    Main registration interface.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    SpecialChars
